data.title: Different behavior between pvr.ccz and png for BlendFunc dest GL_ONE
data.body:
When set BlendFunc dest with GL_ONE in Cocos Studio, the behavior of pvr.ccz and png texture varies. It may be related to premultiple alpha settings.

Originally reported in the comment of http://weibo.com/1702027805/CzrhTdu3a?type=comment

Please contact the author to know how to reproduce and more details.

He mentioned other problems too in the comment

data.title: Improve unicode support
data.body:
Try to fixes #14444
1. refactor and add full set UTF convert functions to StringUtils.
2. replace all usage to UTF16 with UTF32 in Font/Label system.
3. add deprecated inline implement to old public APIs.

data.title: Any reason of using SharedPreferences.commit() in Android?
data.body:
There's an `apply()` method which lets save data with `SharedPreferences` asynchronously, so I can't understand why `commit()` is still being used in `Cocos2dxHelper` class, a game may be freezed when using it.
[SharedPreferences.apply() docs](http://developer.android.com/intl/ru/reference/android/content/SharedPreferences.Editor.html#apply%28%29)

data.title: 3.9 Problem with setTexture and PhysicsBody
data.body:
I have a player, im applying a force to him and change his texture to a flying one(which is wider). Then after 1 second im resetting the forces on that player and change his texture back to an idle one.

Before 3.9 this worked as expected, but now in 3.9 the player is pushed forward after 1 second because the flying texture is wider.

Apparently, this has something to do with the new way components update positions.

data.title: A serious bug in new UIPageView
data.body:
In new UIPageView, getPages function has been deprecated, and add a ASSERT in entrance of the function, when it been called, the program will crash. But in LayoutComponent::refreshLayout() function, getPages() is still been using, this make program can never run.

@neokim @zilongshanren Please check & fix this issue

data.title: iOS contextual prediction not work with TextField.
data.body:
iOS [contextual prediction](http://www.imore.com/quicktype-keyboards-ios-8-explained) not work with TextField:

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/20248/11274704/071199ea-8f15-11e5-833a-faf23893bada.png)
## Steps
1. in iOS 8 or above, focus on a TextField to make keyboard shown
2. switch to English (US) keyboard, by tap the globe icon
3. tap globe icon (again) and hold and make sure Predictive is ON (see above prcture).
4. try tap some letters: eg tap `hell` the `hell` get input into TextField immediately (as in picture below marked as **1** ).
5. at same time, the contextual prediction shows, tap the `he'll` (as marked as **2** below) and nothing happened to TextField and the contextual prediction not consumed.
## Expected Result

TextField replace the `hell` with `he'll` and contextual prediction shows new items.
## Actually Result

TextFeild not responded to contextual prediction.

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/20248/11275479/c179794e-8f18-11e5-86d0-edca85579ce7.png)
## PS

I tested on Android 5.1.1 there is no issue with IME contextual prediction.

data.title: Add windowActionModeOverlay style to main activity and fixes #14401.
data.body: Finally the solution is set `windowActionModeOverlay` to be `true`.

data.title: New label features (spacing, leading, kernings, line height) are strongly needed in Cocos Studio editor.
data.body:
In cocos2d-x version 3.9 there are lots of features that not supported by CocosStudio editor.
Label line spacnig/leading, kernings, and line height are strongly needed by GUI designers.
Also, it would be great to see enabling/disabling of cascade coloring and opacity.

data.title: Scale9Sprite opacity broken
data.body:
If set opacity of scale9sprite just after it's creation, it would't be set.
This bug reproduces after #14263.
Test code is simple:

``` c++
auto sprite = new Scale9Sprite("some_image.png");
sprite.setOpacity(0); // not updated opacity os sprite.
```

P.S.
It seems to me that after moving logic of creating slices to visit function, opacity of scale9sprite is not updated.

data.title: Add Overflow to Label
data.body:
This PR add many good Overflow features to new label.
### Add three different type of Overflow to Label.

```
 enum class Overflow
 {
        //for keep back compatibility
        NORMAL,

        /**
         *In CLAMP mode, when label content goes out of the bounding box, it will be clipped.
         */
        CLAMP,
      /**
         * In SHRINK mode, the font size will change dynamically to adapt the content size.
         */
        SHRINK,
        /**
         *In RESIZE_HEIGHT mode, you can only change the width of label and the height is changed automatically.
         */
        RESIZE_HEIGHT
 };

```
### Added APIs:

```
    /**
     * Change font size of label type BMFONT
     * Note: This function only scale the BMFONT letter to mimic the font size change effect.
     *
     * @param fontSize The desired font size in float.
     */
    void setBMFontSize(float fontSize);

    /**
     * Return the user define BMFont size.
     *
     * @return The BMFont size in float value.
     */
    float getBMFontSize()const;

    /**
     * Toggle wrap option of the label.
     * Note: System font doesn't support manually toggle wrap.
     *
     * @param enable Set true to enable wrap and false to disable wrap.
     */
    void enableWrap(bool enable);

    /**
     * Query the wrap is enabled or not.
     * Note: System font will always return true.
     */
    bool isWrapEnabled()const;

    /**
     * Change the label's Overflow type, 
     * currently only TTF and BMFont support all the valid Overflow type.
     *  Char Map font also supports all the Overflow type except for SHRINK.
     *
     * @param overflow   see `Overflow`
     */
    void setOverflow(Overflow overflow);

    /**
     * Query the label's Overflow type.
     *
     * @return see `Overflow`
     */
    Overflow getOverflow()const;

```
### Limitations:

Currently the System font doesn't support these Overflow feature and Char Map font doesn't support `Shrink` feature.

@WenhaiLin  @dabingnn 

please help to review this PR, thanks.

data.title: Need to create CocosStudio widget and adapt it's size by binary data or node tree.
data.body:
CSLoader ::createNodeWithVisibleSize now gets only file name as argument.
I need to create node and adapt it's size by binary data or node tree.
I think that this functionality would be helpful for other developers too.

data.title: CCRenderTexture does not work properly on some devices which do not support "GL_OES_packed_depth_stencil".
data.body: Some android devices which do not support "GL_OES_packed_depth_stencil" will draw white box for CCClippingNode. To make it work CCRenderTexture should make two render buffers for stencil and depth.
